channel.title: Last chance
channel.description:
ok so ive been searching the net 4 a certain program but it doesnt seem to exsist, this is quite supriseing seeing as i think all it takes is a lil m some 1 who knows what there doing.
ok this is what im after:
a autoclicker with a hotkey as the wheel mouse but clicking it in as the hotkey
also not a auto clicker that clicks in 1 place, it needs to be able to move
ok jst think of it like this a shooting game with a auto clicker that has a hotkey as the mouse wheel click
also mayb to change the number of clicks between say 3 and 7
ok ty btw im not english so mayb sum typeos

item.title: Last chance
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“maniown, post:14, topic:262387”][quote author=bootnecklad link=topic=346510.msg2669911#msg2669911 date=1234783313]

ok i have know idea what im doing if some 1 could make this program 4 me i would be really greatful ok ty

Can you please take an extra minute and write legibly.

k is dis btr?

no liek i r nt enlgish k? Tbh I thought he would of been warned by now.

Ontopic: I never got round to scripting in scar O.o
[/quote]

scar pretty much died didnt it?[/quote]

SCAR is almost the same syntax as Pascal, so I guess by learning SCAR you learn Pascal.

Read full topic

item.title: Last chance
item.dc:creator: @srt8 srt8
item.description:
@srt8 wrote:

SCAR will do that for you if you write the script. It really is not that difficult. You can probably post a thread in the SCAR script request board here and someone might do it for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Last chance
item.dc:creator: @srt8 srt8
item.description:
@srt8 wrote:

It is a scriptable program that can click wherever you tell it to and do many more things. There is a whole section on these forums devoted to it.

You can download it at:
http://freddy1990.com/scar.php
